feed.title: NeuroCases
feed.subtitle: Collection of thought provoking neurology cases encountered during my neurology residency.

entry.title: Case - A 65 year old female with acute onset slurred speech and left hand clumsiness

link.title: Case - A 65 year old female with acute onset slurred speech and left hand clumsiness

entry.summary: A 65 year old female with no significant past medical history started to feel “off” when she went to her bed to sleep. She started to have headache and got up to take tylenol. While taking the pill, she felt the water was coming out of her left mouth. She went to take a shower, and she noticed her left hand was clumsy. She went back to sleep and in the morning, her headache was gone. She called...
